mapper.select: select eoa.*,epc.major_id from ep_out_adviser eoa left join sys_user su on eoa.phone=su.loginName left join ep_practice_company epc on epc.id=eoa.company_id where su.id=#{id} and su.is_del=0 and eoa.is_del=0
select * from ep_out_adviser where is_del=0 and company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT esc.grade, esc.company_id companyId, eoa.NAME, count( eoas.student_company_id ) studentNum FROM ep_out_adviser_student eoas LEFT JOIN ep_student_company esc ON eoas.student_company_id = esc.id AND esc.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_out_adviser eoa ON eoa.id = eoas.adviser_id AND eoa.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_practice_company epc ON epc.id = eoa.company_id WHERE eoas.is_del = 0 AND epc.major_id = #{majorId} GROUP BY esc.grade, eoa.company_id, eoa.NAME

SELECT esc.company_id companyId, esc.grade, count( esc.student_id ) studentNum FROM ep_student_company esc LEFT JOIN ep_out_adviser_student eoas ON eoas.student_company_id = esc.id AND eoas.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_practice_company epc ON epc.id = esc.company_id AND epc.is_del = 0 WHERE esc.is_del = 0 AND eoas.id IS NULL AND epc.major_id = #{majorId} GROUP BY esc.company_id, esc.grade
